    com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.Result<Service>
    ServiceRegistryClient.register(Scope scope, ServiceType serviceType, ServiceMetadata metadata)
    Convenience method that registers a service of the given type using the current KivaKit Application or Server to fill in the service version and to create an application identifier and service description.
